items.sentence: Tom wants to ask what Mary has been doing, but he knows he shouldn't.
Sometimes it's just best to avoid topics that might be controversial.
Have you thought about what time of year you want to visit Australia?
There are several good restaurants within walking distance from here.
One of my brothers is a half-brother and the other is a step-brother.
The day before yesterday, there was a storm, and yesterday it rained.
Mary could tell by the way Tom slammed the door that he wasn't happy.
The classmates Tom shared his lunch with all came down with diarrhea.
Tom was beaten by his father to the point of needing hospitalization.
Tom almost kissed Mary, but noticed everybody watching, so he didn't.
